creator: donaldp@apache.org
text:
JRCS has moved out of maven and into commons. Contained within it is a Diff library that we could use to write a 
diff task. The Diff task could be used in conjunction with patch task for auotmated patching/upgrades etc.

creator: stevel@apache.org
text:
do you want to have this task assigned to you, Peter?
